Ability.name: speak
Ability.description: speak with someone

Ability.name: take up item
Ability.description: take item

Ability.name: Attack
Ability.description: Basic melee attack

Ability.name: Holy attack
Ability.description: Basic holy melee attack

Ability.name: Magic attack
Ability.description: Basic magic attack

Ability.name: Ranged attack
Ability.description: Basic ranged attack

Ability.name: Barbarian anger
Ability.description: The warrior sets himself in the state of berserk, attacking his enemies with vicious blows, while completely neglecting his defence.

Ability.name: Sweeping blow
Ability.description: Attacks every enemy in weapon range with slightly reduced damage.

Ability.name: Bash
Ability.description: Attacks one enemy for serious damage.

Ability.name: Battlecry
Ability.description: The warrior releases a mighty cry that causes his enemies to lose concentration, ultimatly reducing their defence.

Ability.name: Block
Ability.description: The warriors mastery of shields and weapons allows him to block damage at an increased rate.

Ability.name: Charge
Ability.description: Launches an assault at an enemy with increasing speed. The faster the warrior is, the more damage a charge inflicts.

Ability.name: Taunt
Ability.description: Causes surrounding monsters to attack the warrior more likely.

Ability.name: Warmaster
Ability.description: The warrior has become used to the ways of the battlefield to a point, where he can regenerate his abilities faster than normal.

Ability.name: Fire and sword
Ability.description: The warrior calls the spirits of fire upon his weapon, causing it to deal firedamage. The damage depends on the warriors spellpower.

Ability.name: Flame armor
Ability.description: The warrior surrounds himself with angry spirits of fire, who will burn his enemies to ashes, if they dare to come to close.

Ability.name: Pact of flames
Ability.description: The warrior calls upon the fires of hell, causing his weapon to deal firedamage for a significant time. His enemies might catch fire when hit.

Ability.name: barbarian power
Ability.description: The warrior becomes even more bloodthirsty, launching at his enemies with increased attackspeed and damage in a berserk state. Even while neglecting his defence, the impact is not as big as with the barbarian anger.

Ability.name: Hammer blow
Ability.description: Attacks one enemy with a brutal blow and damages nearby enemies as well.

Ability.name: Silencer
Ability.description: Attacks an enemy with a chance to inflict silence.

Ability.name: Monster hunter
Ability.description: For each monster the warrior kills, his strength increases for a short amount of time.

Ability.name: Monster slayer
Ability.description: The warrior has become the worst nightmare of monsters, with every one of them falling at his feet increasing his strength and attackspeed for a short amount of time.

Ability.name: Regeneration
Ability.description: The warrior regains up to 50 percent hitpoints of his total hitpoints through the sheer power of his will.

Ability.name: Defiances
Ability.description: Nearby monsters will attack the warrior, if they are able to. The warriors defence is increased.

Ability.name: Smash blow
Ability.description: Attacks an enemy with an unblockable, armor piercing blow.

Ability.name: Perseverance
Ability.description: The warriors defence increases proportional to the cuts and bruises he receives in combat. The more serious the wounds, the more difficult he is to kill.

Ability.name: Charge scythe
Ability.description: Launches an even stronger charge attack, that may inflict stun.

Ability.name: Warcry
Ability.description: The battle hardened warriors scream leaves his enemies defence wide open, sometimes confusing them as well.

Ability.name: Weaponmaster
Ability.description: The warriors mastery of weapons increases the damage of his basic attacks by 20%.

Ability.name: Whirl blow
Ability.description: Attacks every enemy in weapon range.

Ability.name: Blizzard
Ability.description: The mage summons a leathal cold blizzard that freezes every enemy caught in it to death.

Ability.name: Chainlightning
Ability.description: The mage unleashes a ball of lightning, that may jump from one enemy to another. It hits a maximum of five enemies and the damage is reduced everytime it jumps.

Ability.name: Ball lightning
Ability.description: The mage unleashes a mighty ball lightning, that can jump over to nearby enemies. A maximum of nine enemies is hit and the damage is reduced with every jump.

Ability.name: Chilling cold
Ability.description: The mage has understood everything about ice and snow, allowing him to increase the effectiveness of his icespells by 20%.

Ability.name: Fireball
Ability.description: The mage casts a bolt of fire, that explodes upon hitting an enemy. Other enemies nearby the victim are also caught in the explosion.

Ability.name: Firebolt
Ability.description: The mage unleashes a small bolt of fire, that damages a single enemy.

Ability.name: Firestorm
Ability.description: The mage conjures a deadly wave of fire, that burns every enemy in a circle around him.

Ability.name: Fireblow
Ability.description: The mage casts a strong bolt of fire, that damages one enemy.

Ability.name: Firecolumn
Ability.description: The mage conjurs a column made of hellfire, that will stay for 5 seconds and turn every enemy stupid enough to stay in there to ashes.

Ability.name: Flame wave
Ability.description: The mage conjures a wave of flames, that damages enemies in a circle around him.

Ability.name: Freeze
Ability.description: The mage catches an enemy in a block of pure ice, instantly sealing his movements.

Ability.name: Frost ring
Ability.description: The mage calls upon a deadlier version of the icering.

Ability.name: Icicle
Ability.description: The mage casts a shard of pure ice, that damages his foes.

Ability.name: Ice ring
Ability.description: The mage casts a ring of ice around himself that will damage enemies in range.

Ability.name: Spear of ice
Ability.description: The mage attacks one enemy with a powerful spear of magical ice.

Ability.name: Infernoball
Ability.description: The mage casts an even more powerful fireball.

Ability.name: Ignite
Ability.description: The mage embraces the heat of fire, so that victims of his firespells will likely suffer burn.

Ability.name: Ionisation
Ability.description: The mage has become one with the storm, leading to 20 percent extra damage from his lightning spells.

Ability.name: Lightning
Ability.description: The mage summons a lightning to attack one foe.

Ability.name: Lightning strike
Ability.description: The mage calls upon a mighty lightning to kill an enemy.

Ability.name: Snow storm
Ability.description: The mage calls upon a snow storm to kill every enemy in a circle.

Ability.name: Static shield
Ability.description: The mage surrounds himself with an armor of lightning, that will stun and damage enemies who are bolt enough to attack in close combat.

Ability.name: Thunderstorm
Ability.description: The mage summons a thunderstorm that will assault enemies in its range with lightnings.

Ability.name: Tempest
Ability.description: The mage summons a ferocious tempest that bombards enemies in its wake with lightnings.

Ability.name: Snipe
Ability.description: The archers deadly precision causes his shots to deal more damage than normal.

Ability.name: Blind Rage
Ability.description: The archer attacks the enemies eyes, causing him to go berserk, but be blinded at the same time.

Ability.name: Bow Spirit
Ability.description: The archer becomes one with his weapon, dealing more damage over a longer time. Additionally his critical strike chance is increased. This effect stacks with Elfeyes.

Ability.name: Concentration
Ability.description: The archers steady mind can no longer be confused.

Ability.name: Elfeyes
Ability.description: The archer shoots with deadly precision, leading to an increased critical hit rate.

Ability.name: Deadly Roulette
Ability.description: The projectile has a fifty percent probability to attack another target, if it hits someone. Be careful not to stand in its way, for it distinguishes not between friend and foe.

Ability.name: Catlike Reflexes
Ability.description: The archers nimble mind allows him to avoid damage better.

Ability.name: Explosion Arrow
Ability.description: The projectile is imbued with the power of a weak firespirit. It will deal damage in a small area, if it hits.

Ability.name: Blast Cascade
Ability.description: The projectile is imbued with the power of a firespirit. It will explode with areadamage on hitting. Additionally four more explosions will go of in every direction.

Ability.name: Frost Arrows
Ability.description: The archer summons a spirit of ice into his weapon, causing his shots to deal icedamage over a greater amount of time. There is a chance that his enemies will be frozen solid if they are hit.

Ability.name: Deadly Swarm
Ability.description: The archer shoots four consecutive projectiles that are imbued with vengeful spirits. They will pursue the enemy, even if he tries to run.

Ability.name: Ice Arrows
Ability.description: The archer calls upon the spirits of ice to imbue his projectiles with icedamage.

Ability.name: Mind Wall
Ability.description: The archer has become immune to anger. He will never go berserk again.

Ability.name: Fanshot
Ability.description: The archer shoots five projectiles at a time, aimed at enemies in front of him. The damage dealt by each projectile suffers a little.

Ability.name: Elfwanderer
Ability.description: The archer unleashes a mighty shot that pierces right through an enemy and might hit another enemy behind him.

Ability.name: North Hunter
Ability.description: The archers good longterm relations with the spirits of wind and ice has caused his resistence and his maximum resistance of these elements to rise by 10 percent.

Ability.name: North Roamer
Ability.description: The archer has made a pact with the spirits of wind and ice. His resistance against wind- and icedamage is increased by 20 percent.

Ability.name: Storm Arrows
Ability.description: The mighty spirits of wind themselfes help the archer by imbuing his projectiles with their power, causing them to deal more winddamage for a longer time.

Ability.name: Tripple Shot
Ability.description: The archers mastery of ranged weapons allows him to shoot three projectiles in a short amount of time.

Ability.name: Vacuum
Ability.description: The archer attacks with an arrow imbued with a weaker windspirit, that causes an enemy hit by it to be stunned.

Ability.name: Iron Hail
Ability.description: The archer handles his weapons with elflike precision, attacking up to seven enemys in front of him. The damage dealt by each projectile suffers a little.

Ability.name: Weak Spot
Ability.description: The archer attacks a weak point of his enemy, causing the victim to go berserk.

Ability.name: Wind Arrows
Ability.description: The archer has been grantet the power to imbue his projectiles with winddamage by the spirits of wind.

Ability.name: Windwalk
Ability.description: The spirits of wind help the archer to move faster than normal and avoid damage.

Ability.name: Acid
Ability.description: The priest turns normal water into deadly acid, poisoning one enemy.

Ability.name: Bladestorm
Ability.description: The priest strengthens the weaponarms of his comrades, leading to increased attackspeed for everyone. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.

Ability.name: Blazing Shield
Ability.description: The party is surrounded by holy energy. Everyones defense is increased. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.

Ability.name: Breaking Blow
Ability.description: The priest attacks an enemy with energy that causes elementals to be blown back where they come from.

Ability.name: Burning Rage
Ability.description: The priest inflicts holy anger in his partymembers. They will attack with greater power. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.

Ability.name: Glaring Sun
Ability.description: The priest calls forth a mighty explosion of light that can make every enemy in an area to be affected by blind.

Ability.name: Gentle Glow
Ability.description: The priest bathes a partymember in a mild light, releaving him of blindness and silence.

Ability.name: Omniscent Eye
Ability.description: The party will be immune to blind and berserk for some time. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.

Ability.name: Restore Concentration
Ability.description: The priest heals one friend from confusion and berserk.

Ability.name: Spirit Shield
Ability.description: The priest grants immunity to berserk and confuse to all his partymembers for a small amount of time. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.

Ability.name: Ease Pain
Ability.description: The priest treats a partymemener with healing water that washes away every poison and stops burns.

Ability.name: Remedial Water
Ability.description: The priests grants every partymember immunity to poison and burn for a small amount of time while healing these effects. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.

Ability.name: Dismissing Strike
Ability.description: The priest strikes with all his might. While normal monsters have little to fear from this attack elementals will be easily destroyed by it.

Ability.name: God Strike
Ability.description: Only strong and durable demons will be able to resist the priests sacred strike.

Ability.name: Windstrike
Ability.description: The priest creates a vortex with his attack, that can suck a demonic creature right back to hell.

Ability.name: Cure
Ability.description: The priest restores the hitpoints of one partymemeber.

Ability.name: Grand Cure
Ability.description: The priest restores hitpoints for every partymember.

Ability.name: Sanctified Strike
Ability.description: The priest attacks with godly power, easily sending undead creatures back to their graves.

Ability.name: Bright Blow
Ability.description: The priest attacks an enemy with a blow imbued with holy power. Undead will be severely damaged by the sacred energies.

Ability.name: Hypnosis
Ability.description: The priest confuses a monster, causing it to attack at random.

Ability.name: Hypnotic Vortex
Ability.description: The priest creates a distracting vortex with the ability to confuse every enemy caught in it.

Ability.name: Keen Mind
Ability.description: The priest increases everyones spellpower for a short time. Everyones spells will surely be more effective. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.

Ability.name: Glistening Glare
Ability.description: The priest casts a dazzling light, that can cause an enemy to be affected by blind.

Ability.name: Magic Shield
Ability.description: The priests protecting influence raises the willpower of all partymembers temporarily. With increasing willpower the priest can hold this effect longer.
